sentences.en: Are you acquainted with the president of the university?
sentences.cn: 你认识这个大学的校长 吗 ?

sentences.en: Are you fully acquainted with the latest situation there?
sentences.cn: 你对那儿的最新情况充分了解了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He brought me acquainted with her.
He quickly got acquainted with the new regulations.
sentences.cn: 他很快就熟悉了新规章.

sentences.en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentences.cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentences.en: I am acquainted of the facts.
I am acquainted with the names of at least eight such people.
sentences.cn: 我至少已经获知这些人中间八人的名字.

sentences.en: I got acquainted with him only recently.
I have heard about your friend but I'm not acquainted with him.
sentences.cn: 我听说过你的朋友,但同他不熟.

sentences.en: It'strue we were acquainted, but no more than that.
sentences.cn: 我们的确认识，但仅此而已。

sentences.en: She is acquainted with all the twists that make for efficient cooking.
sentences.cn: 她熟知所有高效率烹调的妙诀.

sentences.en: The meetings were a way to get acquainted with each other.
sentences.cn: 这些会议是一种相互结交的途径。

sentences.en: We got acquainted at the conference.
sentences.cn: 我们在那次会议上相识了.

sentences.en: We would like to get better acquainted.
sentences.cn: 我们希望加深对彼此的了解。

trans.tran_cn: 了解，知晓（某事），熟悉，交游甚广的
trans.tran_en: if you are acquainted with someone, you have met them a few times but do not know them very well

trans.tran_cn: 使熟悉( acquaint的过去式和过去分词 )，使了解，通知，告知
